templates.content: The Lightening Kit allows you to lighten your hair to a level 9 or 10 light blonde so when you apply the GDY colors, they will show up as vibrant as possible. We use 25 Volume Creme Developer so that your hair is left in good condition while offering just the right amount of lift to achieve lighter results.
templates.name: What is the Lightening Kit?

templates.content: Yes! Depending on the color of your hair, sometimes Poser Paste is a great way to create a new and temporary hair color for the day. For instance, applying Ex-Girl Poser Paste over Riot hair can give you a pretty peachy color!
templates.name: Poser paste - Can I use it on dyed hair?

templates.content: Yes, we do! Please email us at pro@gooddyeyoung.com and we can get it all set up for you.
templates.name: Do you have pro accounts for licensed cosmetologists?

templates.content: We suggest waiting at least a week between lightening your hair multiple times, but if you're just using our semi-permanent dyes and not lightening your hair again, you don't need to wait! Just be sure that your hair is completely dry before applying.
templates.name: How long do I have to wait between using either the lightening kit or the semi-permanent dye?

templates.content: When your hair is wet, it is easier to distribute the product, meaning you will use less. The water creates a barrier between the hair cuticle and the pigment molecules which in turn helps the product last between 10-15 washes, where as semi-perm can lasts 24+ washes.
templates.name: Should I wet my hair before applying DYEposit?

templates.content: We can't wait to see your hair! Post a pic or video and tag us @gooddyeyoung

templates.content: Our new 2 oz tubes of semi-permanent hair dye and lightening kit have the perfect amount of product for money pieces, buzzcuts, bangs, dip-dyes, and everything in between! Grab some shades and get creative!
templates.name: Why 2oz tubes on your Streaks and Strands?

templates.content: Our new mini lightening kit contains 2 oz of 25 vol creme developer, and 1 part powder bleach. It's the same as our hair lightening kit and contains soy proteins and coconut oil to condition and strengthen your hair. There is no measuring, just combine and mix!
templates.name: What size is the lightening kit?

templates.content: We've recently modified our formula to help improve the stability of our dyes. Our dyes now look more true to tone out of the tube. Riot now looks more orange out of the tube, but still washes out to the vibrant red-orange that is loved! We're still vegan, cruelty-free, gluten free, and clean. Our dyes contain the same great ingredients and scent you love, leaving your hair super soft with the perfect vibrant color! You can check out the new formula in this video - https://gooddyeyoung.attn.tv/sl/OCino1cZ
templates.name: Replacement for Riot/new formula

templates.content: We've recently modified our formula to help improve the stability of our dyes. You may notice that Rock Lobster looks lighter in the tube. Don't worry! It washes out to the same vibrant red color that is loved! We're still vegan, cruelty-free, gluten free, and clean. Our dyes contain the same great ingredients and scent you love, leaving your hair super soft with the perfect vibrant color!

templates.content: We've begun shipping out new formulas to all retailers. If you purchase a shade from the past formula, it's still good and will result in the same vibrant color you love! We do recommend using your products within a year of purchase for best results.
templates.name: When will (retailer) get the new formula?

templates.content: Yup! Our new formula still gives you the same vibrant GDY colors you love with improved stability.
templates.name: Will the color still be the same on my hair?

templates.content: We recently improved our formula to look true to tone out of the tube. The new formulas are available on our site now, however, some of our retailers may still be carrying the past formula. You may notice some differences with a few of our shades, but when used according to package instructions, you'll see the same results.
templates.name: I purchased 2 tubes of the same shade and they look different. Why?

templates.content: There are 2 tubes (one old formula and one new formula), however, they'll wash out to be the same color.
templates.name: Are there 2 different tubes for the new & old formulas?

templates.content: If you only want to lighten a small section of your hair, you don't have to mix the entire lightening kit at once. It's okay to eyeball the powder to developer ratio (1 part powder to 2 parts developer). As long as the consistency isn't too runny or too thick, it will work just fine. Save the rest for another dye job!
templates.name: Can I lighten a small section of my hair?

templates.content:
So sorry to hear your results ended up being more blue than purple. We'd love to help you with this!
Thanks to feedback like yours, our team has been working hard to improve our formula. We've significantly upped the warm pigments to yield a true, vibrant purple. With this improvement, not only will you love your color, it'll also fade true to tone. We'd love to send you a new tube on us to try, and welcome your feedback! If that's something you are interested in, send me your first and last name, address, and email address. We can't wait for you to try the new PPL Eater!

templates.content: The best way to avoid bleeding is to wash your dye out in sections and use cool water which helps lock the color in. You might want to try to wash your hair in sections the first couple times just to ensure they don't bleed on each other. As long as you're using cool water, you should be good to go.
templates.name: I just created an amazing Streaks and Strands look! How do I avoid bleeding?

templates.content: We suggest using DYEposit once a week in place of conditioner, but you can use it as often as you'd like.
templates.name: How often should I use DYEposit?

templates.content: Gray hair can be stubborn about holding onto pigments in dyes. Since DYEposit contains a lighter pigment load, it may not contain enough to add a tint to gray hair. A few of our darker shades of semi-permanent dye might add a light tint to your hair. I'd suggest trying our PPL Eater, Rock Lobster, Blue Ruin, or Live Laugh Love. If you'd like to use another shade of ours, we suggest pre-lightening your hair with our lightening kit before dyeing it.
templates.name: Will DYEposit cover Gray hair?

templates.content: It smells like coconut and driftwood.
templates.name: What does DYEposit smell like?

templates.content: Yes, it's safe for all ages.
templates.name: Is DYEposit safe for kids?

templates.content: DYEposit is meant to be used all over your hair and won't leave your roots with any buildup or greasy residue.
templates.name: What do you mean by a cleansing product?

templates.content: Fiberhance is a bonding agent that penetrates deep into the cortex to create new hydrogen and ionic bonds which support the damaged internal keratin structure and strengthen and provide manageability back to the hair.
templates.name: What is Fiberhance?

templates.content: DYEposit lasts 10-15 washes. We suggest rinsing your hair with cool water to lock in the pigment.
templates.name: How long does DYEposit last?

templates.content: It's a 4-in-1 color depositing mask. It cleanses, tones, hydrates, and contains a bond builder to repair damaged hair. Whether you're blonde, brunette, or any color of the rainbow, we have a hue for you.
templates.name: What is DYEposit?

templates.content: It contains a lighter pigment load, for just a kiss of color. Semi-permanent dyes will yield a longer and more vivid result due to a higher pigment concentration. DYEposit also contains a bonding agent called fiberhance which penetrates deep into the cortex to create new hydrogen and ionic bonds which support the damaged internal keratin structure and strengthen and provide manageability back to the hair.
templates.name: How is DYEposit different from your semi-permanent dyes?

templates.content: Yes, it's safe for all hair types and textures.
templates.name: Is DYEposit safe for all hair types?

templates.content: Yes. If your hair lifts with yellow or gold tones, platinum DYEposit will help to neutralize those, leaving you with a whiter, brighter base for your semi-perm dye. Pro tip: if your hair is SUPER yellow, put DYEposit on dry hair for a better result.
templates.name: Should I use Platinum DYEposit after lightening my hair to tone my hair before applying a GDY semi-permanent color?

templates.content: It's meant to be used on wet hair. If you're looking for a product to use on dry hair we suggest our semi-permanent dyes.
templates.name: Can I apply DYEposit to dry hair?

templates.content: If you're looking for a bold pop of color, we suggest pre-lightening your hair to a level 10 for best results. While it will deposit pigment, for the best results we suggest using a semi-permanent dye after lightening. If you're looking to add a slight tint to dark hair, due to the lighter pigment load in DYEposit we would suggest using a semi-permanent dye.
templates.name: Will DYEposit show up on dark hair?

templates.content: No, since DYEposit has a lighter pigment load, it wouldn't cover a vibrant color. We suggest reaching out to a professional stylist for more advice.
templates.name: Will Chocolate DYEposit cover my vibrant color?

templates.content: Apply to wet hair weekly or as needed. It's best to comb it through for even distribution and let sit for 5-10mins depending on desired intensity. Rinse until water runs clear. You can use it after shampooing in place of conditioner once a week, so there's no need to condition after.
templates.name: How do I apply DYEposit?

templates.content: It depends on what you're looking for. For maintaining your vibrant color, there's no need to re-lighten your hair before applying. For a bold new look, you can use it on freshly lightened hair. For the most vibrant and long lasting results, we also suggest trying a semi-permanent dye. Try picking a DYEposit shade that will work with your natural hair color, so if you have light brown hair, try red or chocolate, and if you're a natural redhead, copper or red will look amazing! If you're still unsure, shoot us an email at hey@gooddyeyoung.com.

Rock Lobster, Blue Ruin, PPL Eater, and None More Black are the only colors we recommend using on dark hair. templates.content: You can leave it on up to 50 minutes and then rinse out, shampoo and dry. We do suggest checking your hair after 30 minutes to see if you have achieved a high enough level of lift! If upon rinsing out the lightening kit you think you need to go even lighter, we suggest waiting 2-4 days and then lightening again. Be sure to monitor your hair closely as not to over process the hair. Since that would be your second time lightening, we suggest only leaving the lightening kit on for a max of 30 minutes and checking frequently.
templates.name: Is there a specific amount of time I should leave the Lightener on my hair?

templates.content: If you have color on your hair now, and you have less than 1⁄2 of regrowth showing, put the GDY Lightener from root to end following the directions above for sectioning and application. If you have color on your hair now and you have more than 1⁄2 of regrowth, apply the Lightener to your regrowth last, after you have applied the Lightener to the rest of your hair. Virgin hair (hair without dye), lightens faster than color treated hair.
templates.name: What if I have dye already in my hair? How do I lighten it with GDY Lightening Kit?

templates.content: Both! Use PRIME fresh out of the shower before blow drying or air drying to help detangle and cut down your dry time. Use PRIME on dry hair before heat styling or spray it on natural hair for an extra boost of protection!
templates.name: Do I use Prime on wet or dry hair?

templates.content: Poser Paste will last until you wash it out.
templates.name: Poser paste - How long will the color stay in?

templates.content: We have made this easy for you! We've measured both the Creme Developer and the Powder Lightener already and you simply mix one bottle of the Creme Developer with one packet of Powder Lightener, making sure to mix to a nice even cream consistency.
templates.name: How does the Lightening Kit work?

templates.content: It's a color and heat protector that cuts down dry time, detangles, reduces frizz, and leaves your hair soft and shiny!

templates.content: We always recommend seeking a professional when making a dramatic hair transformation such as going platinum in order to maintain the integrity of your hair.
templates.name: Can I use lightening kit to go platinum?

templates.content: You can do either depending on the look you want to achieve. For a color pop after styling, apply when look is complete. For a more lived-in look, apply product and then heat style.

templates.content: For a quick color refresh, we suggest leaving DYEposit on for 5-10 minutes. For a more vibrant look, you can leave it on for longer!

templates.content: This depends on whether you are simply doing a small section of your hair or the entire head. If you're just doing a small section, check out our new Mini Lightening Kit! An entire head could require between 2-5 Lightening Kits. Just remember, it's always better to be safe than sorry and have extra on hand just in case. We suggest mixing one bottle and one packet at a time, that way if you don't need the others you can save them for next time! Our lightening kits are good for over a year!
templates.name: How many Lightening Kits will I need?

templates.content: We do not recommend using our lightening kit on relaxed hair as the hair has already undergone a chemical process. We recommend seeking a professional's help if you are considering lightening your relaxed hair.
templates.name: Can I use lightening kit on relaxed hair?

templates.content: Begin with clean, wet hair. Let it sit for 1-2 minutes and rinse. Rinsing out GDY Color Kind Conditioner with cool or cold water helps your hair hold more shine! And, if you're a semi-perm user, washing, and rinsing in cool or cold water helps to retain your color for longer.
templates.name: How do I use GDY Rinse Color Kind Conditioner?

templates.content: You can easily remove Poser Paste with shampoo. For even faster removal, use our Pre Wash scalp scrub first to break up the product, then shampoo.
templates.name: Poser paste - How do I wash it out?

templates.content: No, Poser Paste can be used on any hair color.
templates.name: Poser paste - Do I need to lighten my hair first?

templates.content: Pre Wash should be used once a week. If you put a lot of product in your hair (dry shampoo, gel, hairspray) you can use Pre Wash up to twice a week.
templates.name: How often should I use Pre Wash?

templates.content: No, our Poser Paste, semi-permanent dyes, and hair care products are not intended for use in the eye area.
templates.name: Poser paste - Can I use it on my brows or lashes?

templates.content: Poser Paste must be used on dry hair for best results.
templates.name: Poser paste - Can I use it on wet or dry hair?

templates.content: Poser Paste dries quickly, so make sure to apply only as much as you can style or work into your hair at one time.
templates.name: Poser paste - How long does it take to dry?

templates.content: Yes, you can use our lightening kit on naturally textured hair. Just be aware that textured hair will lift and lighten differently than non- textured hair so always keep an eye on your hair while it's processing. Please note, we do not recommend using our lightening kit on chemically textured hair, such as perms.
templates.name: Can I use lightening kit on textured hair?

templates.content: They are both formulated with the same scent of a blend of five essential oils. These essential oils are Bergamot, Orange, Lemon, Coriander, and Cedar. Imagine your favorite GDY semi-perm or Poser Paste scent with a lil extra oomph.
